segments.text: I notice the sink overflowing, water spilling everywhere onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor woman doesn't even realize her foot is in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so absorbed in that plate, missing all the trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he could fall any second, it's heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just waiting there, unaware of the danger too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is tempting them into this risky game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, but inside it's all going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the water damage that's sure to come to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and no one sees it but me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene just makes me wish someone would notice and stop it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's mischief is innocent, but the hazards are so real.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame how quickly a normal day can turn messy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt; it would ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
